Judul: THE INFLUENCE OF ANDROGYNY OPPOSITE-SEX ENDORSER IN SOCIAL MEDIA TOWARDS CONSUMERS��� ATTITUDE TO WOMEN���S PURCHASE INTENTION IN FASHION: STUDY OF INSTAGRAM ACCOUNT @KEANUGL IN INDONESIA
Abstrak:
Presently, developments in the world of marketing are getting rapid and more innovative, and the
development of social media is used as an effective marketing tool. Marketers are also seeking a
unique way and higher level of attractiveness to deliver a compelling brand message. This
phenomenon is supported by a shift in lifestyle concept called androgyny. Androgyny shows a role
in a masculine and feminine character at the same time and is strongly tied to fashion. Many
lifestyle, beauty, and fashion Indonesian influencer endorsers have an androgyny style in their
appearance (e.g., Jovi Adhiguna, Endi Feng, Andreas Lukita, Keanu Angelo, and others). In
practice, it turns out that the androgyny phenomenon is associated with the sexuality of someone
who is assumed to be homosexual and transgender. However, not all people in a country have
tolerance for the person’s sexuality or signs assessed if they have sexuality ‘deviation,’ including in
Indonesia, which has a robust Eastern culture and religion. Some studies and journals say that
heteronormativity--a mindset that perceives that sexuality other than heterosexuality is a
deviation--in Indonesia is high. This research is intended to determine whether there is an influence
between male influencer endorser who has an androgynous style and promotes women's fashion
products with consumers' attitudes, moderated by heteronormative society and whether this affects a
woman's purchase intention in fashion products. Keanu Angelo (@keanugl) is the object, and his
Instagram account’s women followers are the subject of this study.
Using a purposive sampling sample of quantitative explanatory this research aims to find out the
relationship of hypothesis on variables that mentioned. The technique of data processing used is
SEM (Structural Equation Modelling) with respondents of 248 women in Indonesia. Result found
that the androgyny celebrity endorser has positive and significant effect on trustworthiness and
attractiveness to consumers’ attitude. However the moderating effect of heteronormative society
from celebrity endorser and consumers’ attitude is insignificant. Last, the consumers’ attitude of
androgyny opposite-sex endorser has a significant and positive effect on women's purchase
intention. It is recommended for further research to explore other variables, and brands to
considering the utilize opposite-sex androgyny celebrity endorser in fashion endorsement to inflict
the purchase intention.
